name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso, steamed milk and creamy foam.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso, hot chocolate and whipped cream.

name: Chai Tea
description: Spice infusion (cinnamon, cardamom, clove) with milk and honey.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted in hot water.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with plenty of steamed milk and little foam.

name: Flat White
description: Double espresso with steamed milk and a silky texture.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso with a small layer of milk foam.

name: Cortado
description: Espresso with an equal amount of hot milk.

name: Espresso
description: Single shot of espresso, intense and creamy flavor.

name: Ristretto
description: Short espresso, extracted with less water for a concentrated flavor.

name: Lungo
description: Long espresso, extracted with more water for a milder taste.

name: Affogato
description: Vanilla ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso.

name: Irish Coffee
description: Espresso, Irish whiskey, brown sugar and whipped cream.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Matcha green tea whisked with steamed milk and honey.

name: Golden Milk
description: Milk with turmeric, ginger, cinnamon and honey.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Creamy hot chocolate made with pure cocoa and whole milk.

name: Cold Brew
description: Coffee brewed cold for 12 hours, smooth and low in acidity.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen, offering creaminess without added milk.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled espresso with ice and optional milk.

name: Frappuccino
description: Blended coffee drink with ice and flavored syrup, topped with whipped cream.

name: Strawberry Smoothie
description: Creamy strawberry smoothie with natural yogurt and honey.

name: Green Smoothie
description: Blend of spinach, avocado, green apple and coconut water.

name: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice.

name: Detox Green Juice
description: Kale, cucumber, apple, ginger and lemon.

name: Chamomile Tea
description: Gentle infusion of chamomile flowers.

name: Mint Tea
description: Fresh mint leaves steeped in hot water.

name: Black Tea
description: Classic black tea with a strong, full-bodied flavor.

name: White Tea
description: Delicate white tea made from young leaves.

name: Oolong Tea
description: Semi-fermented tea offering freshness and a complex aroma.

name: Blueberry Scone
description: Soft scone with fresh blueberries and a crunchy topping.

name: Croissant
description: Buttery, flaky puff pastry.

name: Chocolate Muffin
description: Soft muffin with semi-sweet chocolate chips.

name: Carrot Cake
description: Homestyle carrot cake with chocolate frosting.

name: Brownie
description: Dense, moist brownie made with Belgian chocolate.

name: Cheese Bread
description: Brazilian cheese bread, soft and flavorful.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Whole grain bread slices topped with avocado puree and lemon.

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: Ciabatta bread with shredded chicken breast and herb mayo.

name: Turkey Sandwich
description: Rye bread with turkey breast, Swiss cheese and arugula.

name: Veggie Wrap
description: Tortilla wrap filled with a veggie burger and greens.

name: Caesar Salad
